seo.title: Ex-Google Engineers Built This Medical Spa CRM | About Senova
seo.description: Learn how Senova democratizes enterprise marketing for medical aesthetics. Backed by healthcare leaders, trusted by 500+ practices nationwide.
seo.og_image: Team photo or office environment showing innovation and expertise

hero.headline: Making Enterprise Marketing Affordable for Every Practice
hero.subheadline: We believe every medical aesthetics practice deserves the same powerful tools as billion-dollar chains - without the enterprise price tag.

content.title: The Problem We Discovered
content.description: While working with enterprise healthcare organizations, our founders noticed something troubling: small and medium medical practices were being priced out of modern patient acquisition technology. A single medical spa was paying $2,000+ per month for tools that delivered mediocre results.

content.title: Building the Solution
content.description: We assembled a team of data scientists, healthcare marketers, and engineers from Google, Meta, and leading healthcare companies. Our mission: rebuild enterprise patient intelligence from the ground up, specifically for medical aesthetics at an affordable price.

content.title: Launch and Rapid Growth
content.description: Senova launched with 10 beta practices. Within 6 months, we were serving 200+ practices across the country, helping them reduce patient acquisition costs by an average of 60%.

content.title: Industry Leader
content.description: Now serving 500+ practices nationwide, Senova has become the go-to patient intelligence platform for medical aesthetics. We've helped practices generate over $50M in additional revenue through smarter marketing.

sections.headline: Our Mission
sections.statement: To democratize patient acquisition technology, making enterprise-level marketing intelligence accessible and affordable for every medical aesthetics practice.

values.title: Accessibility
values.description: Every practice deserves powerful tools, regardless of size or budget

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear pricing, honest metrics, and no hidden fees or surprises

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Continuously improving our platform based on real practice needs

values.title: Partnership
values.description: We succeed when our practices succeed - your growth is our growth
